description.fr: Vaincre tous les Taures. \--- {%FightStarted} Invoque un {Summoning:236}. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} Ajoute un {Spell:203181} à votre main.
description.en: Defeat all the Taurs. \--- {%FightStarted} Summons one {Summoning:236}. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} Adds one {Spell:203181} to your hand.
description.es: Vencer a todos los toros. \--- {%FightStarted} Invoca un {Summoning:236}. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} Añade un {Spell:203181} a tu mano.
description.de: Besiege alle Tauren. \--- {%FightStarted} Beschwört einen {Summoning:236}. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} Fügt eine {Spell:203181} deiner Hand hinzu.
description.pt: Derrotar todos os Tauros. \--- {%FightStarted} Invoca um {Summoning:236}. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} Adiciona um {Spell:203181} à sua mão.
